original_text: Then the offering of Judah and Jerusalem will be pleasing to the Lord as in the days of old and as in former years.
korean_text: 그 때에 유다와 예루살렘의 봉헌물이 옛날과 고대와 같이 나 여호와께 기쁨이 되려니와

sentences.original_text: Then the offering of Judah and Jerusalem
will be pleasing to the Lord
as in the days of old
